LanguageData.EasierExpectations.MinMoodBonus.Title: Minimum mood bonus
LanguageData.EasierExpectations.MinMoodBonus.Desc: The mood each colonist gets at 'sky high' expectations level. Vanilla: 0. Change requires restart.
LanguageData.EasierExpectations.MaxMoodBonus.Title: Maximum mood bonus
LanguageData.EasierExpectations.MaxMoodBonus.Desc: The mood each colonist gets at 'extremely low' expectations level. Vanilla: 30. Change requires restart.
